meta.title: Fruit Frenzy - Fruit Clash
meta.description: Catch the freshest news and juicy updates from the world of Fruit Clash!

newsItems.title: New Juicer Mode Incoming
newsItems.excerpt: Get ready for the sweetest twist yet! Juicer Mode introduces time-limited levels, exploding fruits, and bonus chains. Will you rise to the fruity challenge?

newsItems.title: Tropical Clash Tournament Begins
newsItems.excerpt: Step into the blender! Compete in the Tropical Clash Tournament and slice your way to the top for juicy prizes and exclusive fruit skins. Registration opens soon!

newsItems.title: Update 2.5 Patch Highlights
newsItems.excerpt: Fruit Clash 2.5 is here! Enjoy crisper visuals, 20 vibrant new levels, and smoother gameplay thanks to our latest optimizations. Dive into the flavor now!

newsItems.title: Inside the Orchard: Level Design Secrets
newsItems.excerpt: Go behind the scenes with our lead fruit architect! Learn how the juiciest puzzles are crafted and what it takes to design levels that really pop.
